text: In God we trust; all others must bring data.
author: W. Edwards Deming

text: Without data you're just another person with an opinion.
author: W. Edwards Deming

text: Torture the data, and it will confess to anything.
author: Ronald Coase

text: Facts are stubborn, but statistics are pliable.
author: Mark Twain

text: Data is a precious thing and will last longer than the systems themselves.
author: Tim Bernersâ€‘Lee

text: The goal is to turn data into information, and information into insight.
author: Carly Fiorina

text: Numbers have an important story to tell. They rely on you to give them a clear and convincing voice.
author: Stephen Few

text: All models are wrong, but some are useful.
author: George Box

text: Without analysis, data is just noise.
author: Unknown
